T02D2139:199a-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a ru ni ka aa bhi she
T02D2139:199a-2: ka pra ka ra na au pa de sha n'a
T02D2139:199a-4: dpal thugs rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i man ngag gi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2139:199a-5: bcom ldan 'das dpal padma'i snang ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2139:199a-6: dang po re zhig rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gang
T02D2139:199a-7: zhig / padma rab tu zab pa'i dkyil 'khor ram
T02D2139:199a-8: / padma rgyal po gang yang rung ba'i dbang dang gnang ba thob pas //
T02D2139:199a-9: rtsa ba'i snga gsal bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gsum song nas /
T02D2139:199a-10: slob ma rjes su gzung bar 'dod na /
T02D2139:199a-11: gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar /
T02D2139:199a-12: slob ma ni dang pa dang snying rje dang shes rab che ba /
T02D2139:199a-13: 'khor ba la skyon du mi lta zhing /
T02D2139:199a-14: mang du thos pa bla ma la gus shing /
T02D2139:199a-15: the pa chen po'i chos la the tshom med pa /
T02D2139:199b-0: khyad @199b bar du nges pa'i don dang /
T02D2139:199b-1: spyan ras gzigs la mos shing /
T02D2139:199b-2: dbang po rno ba'i gang zag des /
T02D2139:199b-3: bla ma la gsol ba 'debs pa ni //
T02D2139:199b-4: sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi //
T02D2139:199b-5: padma'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang //
T02D2139:199b-7: padma'i dbang bskur zhu bar bgyi //
T02D2139:199b-8: de nas bla mas gnang ba sbyin ba ni ;
T02D2139:199b-11: mkhas pa rnams ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2139:199b-12: sems can dang can smin par byed //
T02D2139:199b-13: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //
T02D2139:199b-16: ra yas 'bod kyi ying gnyis spongs //
T02D2139:199b-17: zhes brjod cing slob ma gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2139:199b-18: de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bri ba ni /
T02D2139:199b-20: padma rgyal po gang gis byed kyang rung ste /
T02D2139:199b-21: de la dang pos brtag pa dang /
T02D2139:199b-23: sa sbyang bar bya ba ni /
T02D2139:199b-24: lto 'phye'i lto ba nas ba rkos te /
T02D2139:199b-26: gnas khang dang 'tsham par sa stegs gru bzhi pa byas la /
T02D2139:199b-27: sa'i lha mo la gtor ma phul te /
T02D2139:199b-29: de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2139:199b-30: dri bzang gi chus byugs la /
T02D2139:199b-31: thig gi cho ga lag len bzhin du gdab bo //
T02D2139:199b-33: tshon kha dog lnga ye shes lngar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2139:199b-34: padma zab pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus kyi lte ba dang phyogs bzhir padma 'dab bzhi dmar po la /
T02D2139:199b-35: mtshams kyi 'dab ma dang gong ras mdzes tshon /
T02D2139:199b-36: mu khyud la padma'i phreng ba bri'o //
T02D2139:199b-38: lte ba dmar po la ze'u 'bru dang gong ras
T02D2139:199b-39: ci mdzes 'dab brgyad kyi phyogs bzhi dmar po mtshams
T02D2139:199b-40: bzhi dang mu khyud rnams mdzes tshon du bya'o //
T02D2139:199b-41: de'i rgya ba tu padma 'dab brgyad phyogs bzhi phyogs tshon la /
T02D2139:199b-43: de'i phyir rol yang padma 'dab ma bcu dmar po 'am ser por bya ba'am /
T02D2139:199b-45: yang na khyams phyin chad sbyi dang 'dra bar bris la /
T02D2139:199b-51: gtor ma lnga la sogs pas mtha' ma legs par bskor /
T02D2139:199b-52: gzhan yang dgos pa rnams gzhung bzhin bsham mo //
T02D2139:199b-53: bum pa gtsang ma la bgegs bskrad pa ni /
T02D2139:199b-54: gu gul gyis bdug cing khro bo'i sngags bzlas te /
T02D2139:200a-6: 'o ma la sogs pa blugs la /
T02D2139:200a-8: ras kyis mgul chings dang gzungs thag btags te /
T02D2139:200a-9: 'bras bu can gyi shing lo rlon pas brgyan pa'i
T02D2139:200a-10: bum pa gnyis la rnam rgyal gyi bum pa dang
T02D2139:200a-11: las thams cad ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D2139:200a-12: dbang gi bum pa la sogs ci 'byor bshams /
T02D2139:200a-16: rnam rgyal gyi bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go //
T02D2139:200a-18: de nas rang stan bde ba la 'dug nas /
T02D2139:200a-20: bum ba'i nang du dkyil 'khor rgyas pa bsgom /
T02D2139:200a-21: las bum nang du rta mgrin bsgom pa ni /
T02D2139:200a-22: hr'i: las rta mgrin dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
T02D2139:200a-26: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D2139:200a-27: rta mgo ljang zhur rngog ma dmar ba /
T02D2139:200a-29: phyag g-yas khatv'am ga rtse gsum bsnams pa /
T02D2139:200a-31: bar ma gnyis kyis lha srin sde brgyad kyi tsitta'i phreng ba bsnams pa /
T02D2139:200a-32: g-yas 'og mas zhid dgyug / g-yon gyi 'og mas
T02D2139:200a-33: thod pa lcang lo can lha srin sde brgyad kyi
T02D2139:200a-34: khrag gis bkang ba zhal du gsol ba /
T02D2139:200a-37: sku smad stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs byas pa /
T02D2139:200a-38: sku stod zhing lpags kyi g-yang gzhi man bas pa /
T02D2139:200a-39: sbrul rigs bzhis dbu dang yan lag brgyan pa /
T02D2139:200a-40: me dpung gi dbus su bzhugs par bsam /
T02D2139:200a-42: aom hr'i: ha ya gr'i wa padma nta kri ta
T02D2139:200a-43: badzra kro dha ha ya gr'i wa hu lu hu
T02D2139:200a-44: lu sarba p'a pam shuddhe shuddhe ye h'um phat sv'a
T02D2139:200a-46: khro bo'i sku gsung thugs kyi bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar gsam /
T02D2139:200a-47: de nas slob ma rnams la /
T02D2139:200a-48: las bum gyis phyir khrus byas te /
T02D2139:200a-49: nang du btang la mandal phul nas gral la rim par gzhag go //
T02D2139:200a-50: de nas gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02D2139:200a-51: lag tu me tog bzung la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2139:200a-54: bum pa gsum ga mi dmigs pa'i dang las /
T02D2139:200a-55: bsod nams kyi sbrin kha dog lnga lnga las 'og phyogs kyi 'jig rten khams thams cad khyab /
T02D2139:200a-56: de'i steng du rnam par shes pa yi ge hr'i:
T02D2139:200b-0: dkar po thig le @200b gnyis ga dang bcas pa
T02D2139:200b-1: bsgom // de las yig 'bru kha dog sna tshogs
T02D2139:200b-2: pa sbrin gyi thog tu 'phros pa las de bzhin
T02D2139:200b-3: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi 'od
T02D2139:200b-4: zer las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po /
T02D2139:200b-7: nub padma r'a ga / byang aindra n'i la las grub pa /
T02D2139:200b-10: ka ba dang rta babs bzhis mdzes pa /
T02D2139:200b-11: rin po che'i pha gu dang /
T02D2139:200b-12: dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2139:200b-15: chos 'khor dang bcas pa mtho ba /
T02D2139:200b-16: 'dod yon gyi snam bu dmar po la /
T02D2139:200b-17: mchod pa'i lha mos bskor ba'i nang du //
T02D2139:200b-18: padma rim pa gnyis pa'i gdan gyi dbus su yi
T02D2139:200b-19: ge hr'i: las padma dang nyi ma zla ba'i gdan
T02D2139:200b-20: gyi dbus su / rang nyid thugs rje chen po sku mdog dkar ba /
T02D2139:200b-25: de'i steng ma dbus ljang gu /
T02D2139:200b-28: de'i steng ma dbus dmar ba /
T02D2139:200b-34: sbyan gsum gsum zhi bas gzigs pa /
T02D2139:200b-35: de'i steng du khro bo'i zhal nag po /
T02D2139:200b-38: dbu skra dmar ser me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02D2139:200b-40: dbus kra nag po la rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
T02D2139:200b-41: zhal nag po'i sted na 'od dpag med kyi zhal dmar po mgrin pa yan chad phyung ba /
T02D2139:200b-44: phyag brgyad kyi dang po gnyis kyis yum la 'khyud pa /
T02D2139:200b-46: g-yas 'og mas mu tig ge phreng ba /
T02D2139:200b-50: g-yas bzhi pas chos kyi 'khor lo /
T02D2139:200b-51: g-yon bzhi bas padma'i mda' gzhu'o //
T02D2139:200b-52: sku dang yan lag thams cad la rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
T02D2139:200b-53: yum rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sku mdog dmar mo //
T02D2139:200b-56: g-yas kyis zangs gri bsnams pa /
T02D2139:200b-57: g-yon thod khrag bsnams pas yab la 'khyud pa /
T02D2139:200b-58: skra grol ba rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2139:200b-59: zhabs g-yon yab dang spyan nas brkyang pa /
T02D2139:200b-60: g-yas kyi yab kyi dar sham grol ba la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2139:200b-61: yab kyi phyag dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis /
T02D2139:201a-0: @201a * // mchog sbyin pa'i phyag mthil la mdzes par gzigs pa'i spyan stong mnga' ba /
T02D2139:201a-1: sku'i phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer kha
T02D2139:201a-2: dog sna lngas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
T02D2139:201a-4: mdun gyi padma la rdo rje phag mo dmar mo zhal gnyis ma'i spyi bor phag zhal /
T02D2139:201a-5: g-yas gri gug / g-yon thong ba /
T02D2139:201a-6: mchan khung na khatv'am ga bsnams pa /
T02D2139:201a-7: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2139:201a-8: g-yas su yum chen mo ser mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
T02D2139:201a-9: g-yas thugs kar rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D2139:201a-10: g-yon pa autpa la'i steng na po ti bsnams pa /
T02D2139:201a-11: 'og ma gnyis mnyam gzhag mdzad pa'o //
T02D2139:201a-12: rgyab phyogs su sgrol ma ljang gu /
T02D2139:201a-14: phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
T02D2139:201a-17: g-yon phyogs su yum yi ge drug ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi'i /
T02D2139:201a-18: dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyor ba /
T02D2139:201a-19: g-yas 'og mas mu tig gi phreng ba 'dzin pa /
T02D2139:201a-21: mtshams bzhir bum pa bdud rtsis bkang pa'i steng du ka p'a la re re gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2139:201a-22: lha mo bzhi po dar gyi sham thabs can /
T02D2139:201a-23: rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2139:201a-25: shar phyogs su mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po //
T02D2139:201a-27: dang po gnyis kyis yum m'a ma k'i la 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar ba /
T02D2139:201a-31: m'a ma k'i sngon mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas 'khyud ba'o //
T02D2139:201a-32: lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung ldan ser bo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ba /
T02D2139:201a-33: dang po gnyis kyis yum sangs rgyas spyan ma ser
T02D2139:201a-34: mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la
T02D2139:201a-35: 'khyud pa'i rgyab tu thal mo sbyor ba /
T02D2139:201a-38: rgyab phyogs su rnam par snang mjad dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
T02D2139:201a-39: dang po gnyis kyis yum gos dkar mo me tog
T02D2139:201a-40: dkar dmar gnyis bsnams pa la 'khyud pas thal mo
T02D2139:201a-43: byang phyogs su don yod grub pa ljang gu /
T02D2139:201b-0: zhal gcig phyag bzhi'i dang po gnyis kyis yum @201b
T02D2139:201b-1: dam tshig sgrol ma sku mdog ljang ser autpal dang
T02D2139:201b-5: g-yon 'og mas autpal la bsnams pa'o //
T02D2139:201b-6: zhabs g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum pa'o //
T02D2139:201b-7: dar sham dang rin po ches brgyan ba'o //
T02D2139:201b-9: zhal gcig phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yab la 'khyud pa /
T02D2139:201b-10: rus pa'i rgyan can sku mdog yab dang mthun pa /
T02D2139:201b-11: zhabs gnyis kyis yab kyi dar sham cud zad grol ba la 'khyud par bsgom /
T02D2139:201b-12: yab gyi g-yon gyi gnyis pa ni padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2139:201b-14: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi zhal gcig phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyor ba /
T02D2139:201b-15: g-yas gri gug g-yon thod khrag bsnams pa /
T02D2139:201b-16: sku mdog ni dkar mo dang /
T02D2139:201b-21: m/ e'i phyi'i rgyab pad 'dab bcu'i gdan la /
T02D2139:201b-22: phyogs bcu'i padma rigs kyis ngas rgyas bcu po ni /
T02D2139:201b-24: chos gos dmar ser gsol ba /
T02D2139:201b-25: phyag na padma stong dang ldan pa re re bsnams pa /
T02D2139:201b-27: grva bzhi la lha snam gyi mtshams bzhir /
T02D2139:201b-31: g-yon autpal la'i steng du po ti bsnams pa'o //
T02D2139:201b-32: shar lhor phyag na rdo rje ljang gu /
T02D2139:201b-35: lho nub tu byams pa dmar ser /
T02D2139:201b-37: g-yon autpa la'i sted na bu ma pa'o //
T02D2139:201b-38: nub byang du sgrib pa rnam par sel ba ser skya /
T02D2139:201b-44: shar sgor 'dod pa'i rgyal po dkar po zhal gcig pa /
T02D2139:201b-47: lho sgor gshin rje gshed ser nag / zhal gcig pa /
T02D2139:201b-50: nub sgor rta mgrin dmar po /
T02D2139:201b-54: byang sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag / zhal gcig phyag g-yas ral gri /
T02D2139:202a-0: sku smad stag gi sham thabs @202a * //
T02D2139:202a-2: / zhabs g-yas brkyang g-yon ba skum gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2139:202a-3: phyi rol du lha mo me tog ma dkar mo /
T02D2139:202a-8: sil snyan ma zla ba'i mdog can ma rnams kyis mchod par bsam mo //
T02D2139:202a-9: sgo khang du tshad med pa'i lha mo bzhi /
T02D2139:202a-10: byams pa tshad med pa'i lha mo dngul gyi me long blta ba /
T02D2139:202a-11: snying rje'i lha mo ser mo gser gyi me long blta ba /
T02D2139:202a-12: dga' ba'i lha mo dmar mo zangs kyi me long blta ba /
T02D2139:202a-13: btang snyoms kyi lha mo sngon mo g-yu'i me long blta ba'o //
T02D2139:202a-14: de'i phyi rol du rgyal po chen po bzhi ni /
T02D2139:202a-15: byang phyogs su rnam thos sras ser po /
T02D2139:202a-16: g-yas me tog au dumw'a ra gtso bo la 'bul ba /
T02D2139:202a-17: g-yon ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2139:202a-18: shar phyogs su yul 'khor srung dkar po /
T02D2139:202a-19: g-yas me tog / g-yon bi wang 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2139:202a-20: lho phyogs su 'phyags skyes po sngon po /
T02D2139:202a-21: g-yas me tog / g-yon ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2139:202a-22: nub phyogs su spyan mi bzang dmar po /
T02D2139:202a-23: g-yas me tog / g-yon sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2139:202a-24: de'i phyi rol du ye shes lnga'i 'od kha dog lnga rdo rje'i gur du bsam mo //
T02D2139:202a-25: 'od kyi nang du yi ge drug pa'i gsung gi sgra rang bzhin gyis bsgrag par bsam mo //
T02D2139:202a-26: de nas thugs ka'i hr'i: las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'phros nas /
T02D2139:202a-28: ye shes sems dpa' rang gis bsgoms pa dang 'dra
T02D2139:202a-29: ba spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa
T02D2139:202a-30: la / dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chad pa //
T02D2139:202a-31: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya ste /
T02D2139:202a-32: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab bar bya'o //
T02D2139:202a-33: de nas lha thams cad gsal btab la bsnyen pa bya ba ni /
T02D2139:202a-35: aom a'a: h'um hra'i: aom ma ni padme h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2139:202a-37: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
T02D2139:202a-39: bdzra bi ro tsa n'i ye h'um phat /
T02D2139:202a-40: ha ri ni sa h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2139:202a-41: zhes pa'i sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs nas bzlas pa bya ba dang ;
T02D2139:202a-42: 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa phul te /
T02D2139:202a-43: de rnams kyi byin brlabs rang gi zugs ka'i hr'i: la bsdu'o //
T02D2139:202a-44: bum pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsams la /
T02D2139:202a-45: de dag zhu bas bdud rtsi'i chur bsam zhing bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D2139:202a-46: padma zab pa byed na ni /
T02D2139:202b-0: sgrub @202b thabs las byung ba bzhin du /
T02D2139:202b-2: cho ga gzhan dag rnams ni 'dra bas thun mong du shes par bya'o //
T02D2139:202b-3: de nas slob ma la skyabs su 'gro ba thun mong ba byin la /
T02D2139:202b-5: sgrol ma'i rgyud nas gsungs pa /
T02D2139:202b-6: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'chi //
T02D2139:202b-7: sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags //
T02D2139:202b-8: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D2139:202b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D2139:202b-10: sems can rnams la phan slad du //
T02D2139:202b-11: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02D2139:202b-12: de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2139:202b-14: yang dam tshig dang sdom pa byin pa ni /
T02D2139:202b-15: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D2139:202b-16: rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2139:202b-17: sangs rgyas padma rnam rgyal dang //
T02D2139:202b-18: gsang sngags rgyal ba mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2139:202b-19: bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02D2139:202b-20: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
T02D2139:202b-21: khyad par du yang slob dpon la //
T02D2139:202b-22: rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2139:202b-23: mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang po //
T02D2139:202b-24: rnal 'byor ma dang snang mdzad tshogs //
T02D2139:202b-25: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2139:202b-26: bdag ni dus 'di nas bzung ste //
T02D2139:202b-27: ji srid gnyis med la gnas par //
T02D2139:202b-28: de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med pa //
T02D2139:202b-29: nyi shu rtsa gnyis legs par bsrung //
T02D2139:202b-31: de nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos bshad de des shes bskyed pa ni /
T02D2139:202b-32: rnam snang mngon byang nas gsungs te /
T02D2139:202b-33: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen nyid /
T02D2139:202b-34: au dumw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D2139:202b-35: brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2139:202b-36: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D2139:202b-37: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D2139:202b-38: gang gi sems can mnyam med don //
T02D2139:202b-39: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2139:202b-40: bskal ba bye ba du ma ru //
T02D2139:202b-41: sngon chad sdig pa bgyis pa gang //
T02D2139:202b-43: mthong bas byang bar 'gyur bas na //
T02D2139:202b-44: grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i //
T02D2139:202b-45: tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos //
T02D2139:202b-46: skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni //
T02D2139:202b-48: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02D2139:202b-49: blo gros shin tu mi g-yo ba //
T02D2139:202b-50: de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu //
T02D2139:202b-51: sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bshad //
T02D2139:202b-52: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyi //
T02D2139:202b-53: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02D2139:202b-54: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02D2139:203a-0: bdag nyid chen po kun gyi @203a * //
T02D2139:203a-2: / bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02D2139:203a-3: yongs su bzung la skye bzhin par //
T02D2139:203a-4: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02D2139:203a-5: dbang bskur ba ru skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2139:203a-6: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba //
T02D2139:203a-7: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D2139:203a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D2139:203a-11: de nas slob ma'i mgo bor rdo rje bzung la /
T02D2139:203a-12: khyod kyis padma rgyal po dang /
T02D2139:203a-13: padma zab pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di /
T02D2139:203a-14: snod min pa la bstan na /
T02D2139:203a-15: dam tshig nyams par 'gyur pa'i phyir /
T02D2139:203a-16: sngon dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba dang /
T02D2139:203a-17: 'di la ma dad pa'i snod la /
T02D2139:203a-18: 'di lta bu 'di khyod kyis yang su rung rung la smra zhing brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D2139:203a-19: de nas ka p'a la'i nang gi bdud rtsi byin la /
T02D2139:203a-20: 'di ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu //
T02D2139:203a-21: ma bsrungs sreg par byed pa'i dug bsrungs na dngos grub thob pa ni //
T02D2139:203a-22: bdud rtsi lnga yi chus grub po //
T02D2139:203a-23: aom panytsa aa mri ta au dka tha tha /
T02D2139:203a-24: de nas slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag ste /
T02D2139:203a-25: spyan ras gzigs dbang rdo rje phag mo ded //
T02D2139:203a-26: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur //
T02D2139:203a-27: gal te tshul 'di gzhan la smra mi bya //
T02D2139:203a-28: smras na de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2139:203a-29: yang spyi por rdo rje bzhag la de ring khyod
T02D2139:203a-30: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs su
T02D2139:203a-31: zhugs kyi / ngas khyod la sangs rgyas padma rnam
T02D2139:203a-32: rgyas spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes bskyed par bya
T02D2139:203a-33: zhugs kyi / ste / ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2139:203a-35: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02D2139:203a-36: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos /
T02D2139:203a-37: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste /
T02D2139:203a-38: dam tshig nyams par gyur te re /
T02D2139:203a-39: yang rdo rje spyi bor gzhag / deng phyin chad khyod kyi spyan ras gzigs nga yin gyi /
T02D2139:203a-40: gang ngas padma'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil
T02D2139:203a-41: 'khor chen po sgoms shig ces bsgo bde khyod kyis
T02D2139:203a-42: bya'o // khyod kyis nga la brnyas bar mi bya ste /
T02D2139:203a-43: khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas /
T02D2139:203a-44: dmyal bar lhung bar gyur te re zhes brjod do //
T02D2139:203a-45: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa ni /
T02D2139:203a-46: bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgoms nas /
T02D2139:203b-0: slob ma rnams spyan ras @203b gzigs su gsal bar bskyed la /
T02D2139:203b-1: 'og min gyi gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal yas nas /
T02D2139:203b-2: sangs rgyas padma'i rgyal po dang /
T02D2139:203b-3: spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad spyan drangs la /
T02D2139:203b-4: bdag nyid dang slob ma rnams la gzhug go //
T02D2139:203b-5: spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag rnams kyang dbul /
T02D2139:203b-7: dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chad ba //
T02D2139:203b-8: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi sku //
T02D2139:203b-9: bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D2139:203b-10: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
T02D2139:203b-11: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas //
T02D2139:203b-12: sku yi byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02D2139:203b-13: aom dpal ldan sangs rgyas gsung 'chad ba ;
T02D2139:203b-14: / zhis tshig bsgyur la shes par bya'o //
T02D2139:203b-16: dpal ldan sangs rgyas thugs 'chang ba /
T02D2139:203b-18: aom a'a: h'um hr'i: aom ma ni padme h'um /
T02D2139:203b-20: sarba buddha d'a kyi n'i ye /
T02D2139:203b-22: bdzra bee ro tsa n'i ye /
T02D2139:203b-24: a'a be sha ya y'a be sha ya /
T02D2139:203b-25: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhishi nytsa h'um a'a: zhes brjod cing ye shes pa gzhug go //
T02D2139:203b-26: ye shes pa zhugs pa'i rtags sems bde gsal mi rtog pa la sogs pa byung ba dang /
T02D2139:203b-27: lha la dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02D2139:203b-28: sangs rgyas padma rnam rgyas dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2139:203b-29: 'od dpag med pa'i rgyal sras spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2139:203b-30: padma'i rigs kyi mchog gyur chen po yi //
T02D2139:203b-31: skal ldan rnams la dbang bzhi bskur du gsol //
T02D2139:203b-32: zhes mandal dbul la sogs ba gdab po //
T02D2139:203b-33: de nas bum dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D2139:203b-34: bdag dkyil 'khor gtso bor gsal ba'i thugs ka nas /
T02D2139:203b-36: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang lnga spros te /
T02D2139:203b-38: / slob ma'i spyi bor dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
T02D2139:203b-40: yid la spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
T02D2139:203b-41: dngos su rnam rgyal bum pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzung nas /
T02D2139:203b-42: ji ltar sangs rgyas padma rnams rgyas kyi /
T02D2139:203b-43: 'od dpag med pa'i rgyal sras spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2139:203b-44: chos kyi rgyal srid chen por dbang bskur ltar //
T02D2139:203b-45: de bzhin bdag gis khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02D2139:203b-46: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2139:203b-47: de bzhin gshegs la khrus gsol ltar /
T02D2139:203b-48: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D2139:203b-49: spyan ras gzigs dbang dbang thob po //
T02D2139:204a-3: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
T02D2139:204a-5: bdzra bee ro tsa n'i ye /
T02D2139:204a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02D2139:204a-9: slob ma mgon po padma'i snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2139:204a-10: bskyed rim rgyas par bsgom pa la dbang bum chu
T02D2139:204a-11: yar 'khyil ba las 'od dpag med pas dbu brgyan
T02D2139:204a-12: par bsgom / des lus dag pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo /
T02D2139:204a-13: mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa yin no //
T02D2139:204a-14: slob ma la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul lo //
T02D2139:204a-15: de nas gsang ba'i dbang ni /
T02D2139:204a-16: ka p'a la bdud rtsis bkang ba lag tu bzung la /
T02D2139:204a-18: sangs rgyas padma rnam rgyal yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi babs par bsams la /
T02D2139:204a-19: de'i 'od zer yi ge drug pa'i gra dang bcas pa phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
T02D2139:204a-20: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2139:204a-21: bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bas ma zhing /
T02D2139:204a-22: 'od dpag med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung gi mdzod //
T02D2139:204a-23: yi ge drug pa phyogs bcur chos 'khor bskor ba'i gsung //
T02D2139:204a-24: rgyal pa'i gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu'i dbang thob pas //
T02D2139:204a-25: brgyad khri bzhi stong gsang ba'i chos kyi dbang bskur ro //
T02D2139:204a-27: sarba ta th'a ga tag aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2139:204a-29: des ngag gi sgrib pa dag nas /
T02D2139:204a-30: skye ba med pa'i gsung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
T02D2139:204a-31: ba gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pa yen no
T02D2139:204a-32: // de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni /
T02D2139:204a-33: me long g-y'a dag pa la /
T02D2139:204a-34: rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs brnyan 'char du bcug la /
T02D2139:204a-35: de la spyan ras gzigs kyi yum mar me las
T02D2139:204a-36: mar me chad pa bzhin du chad nas de dang
T02D2139:204a-37: gnyis su med par zhugs te /
T02D2139:204a-38: thugs ka nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba kha dog sna lnga 'phros /
T02D2139:204a-39: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum rnams bskul nas /
T02D2139:204a-40: de dag rnal 'byor ma la thim /
T02D2139:204a-41: de mthong ba tsam gyis zag med kyi bde ba
T02D2139:204a-42: ster nus pa'i lha mo me long nang gi gzugs
T02D2139:204a-44: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs de yang /
T02D2139:204a-45: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu /
T02D2139:204a-46: me long nang gi lha mo lag pa g-yon pas gtad la /
T02D2139:204a-47: dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2139:204a-48: shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2139:204a-49: bde chen nyid du rnam sbyar bas //
T02D2139:204b-0: nyon mongs @204b shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs //
T02D2139:204b-1: shes rab nam mkha' lta bu yi //
T02D2139:204b-4: citta pradzny'a sarba ta th'a ga ta n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02D2139:204b-5: des shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pa yin no //
T02D2139:204b-6: da ni tshig dbang rin po che bskyur pa na //
T02D2139:204b-7: bzhir mi dmigs pa ye shes kyi /
T02D2139:204b-8: 'gro ba drug gi snang ba'i yul med de //
T02D2139:204b-9: snang med ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pas //
T02D2139:204b-10: chos kyi sku las longs spyod rdzogs sku dang //
T02D2139:204b-11: sprul ba'i sku ni ye shes dpag med che //
T02D2139:204b-12: mkha' dang mnyam la bdag med don mdzad do //
T02D2139:204b-14: rjes la slob ma lhar gyur ba la mchod pa lnga 'bul /
T02D2139:204b-15: bkra shis kyi tshig rnams brjod do //
T02D2139:204b-17: de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo cho ga bzhin du bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2139:204b-18: gtor ma rnams rgyas par bsngos la btang ba dang /
T02D2139:204b-19: rjes kyi cho ga rnams byas la /
T02D2139:204b-20: slob dpon la me tog dbul ba dang /
T02D2139:204b-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos te /
T02D2139:204b-24: nang gi sbyin sreg rtsa gsum 'dus mdor /
T02D2139:204b-25: ma las thob pa'i nyi ma byang chub kyi sems me 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung gis sbar nas /
T02D2139:204b-26: gzung 'dzin gyi rtog ba skye ba med par bsreg pa'i med dbu ma nas snying gar phyin pas /
T02D2139:204b-27: pha las thob pa'i zla ba byang chub kyi sems
T02D2139:204b-28: dang snying gar 'dzom pas lus sems mi dmigs pa'i
T02D2139:204b-30: spyin sreg rnams kyi mchog go zhes spyan ras gzigs kyi rgyud nas gsungs so //
T02D2139:204b-32: sa khru gang la mdzub gang bar brus /
T02D2139:204b-33: kha khyer mdzub gang phyir bskyed /
T02D2139:204b-34: dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bya /
T02D2139:204b-35: mu khyud padma'i phreng bas bskor //
T02D2139:204b-36: de'i nang du tsandan gyis zla gam du brtsigs /
T02D2139:204b-39: gtor ma dang de rnams g-yas g-yon dang mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2139:204b-42: lta stangs rnams las dang mthun par byas te /
T02D2139:204b-43: me lha bskyed la mchod pa dang sreg rdzas dbul /
T02D2139:204b-45: de nas me lha med gyur pa'i dbus su /
T02D2139:204b-46: spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus gang rung bskyed /
T02D2139:204b-47: sreg rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2139:204b-48: dbul ba ni rgyal po'i rim pa can nam /
T02D2139:204b-50: bram ze'i rim pa med de /
T02D2139:205a-3: sngags kyi 'od zer ni zhi ba dang /
T02D2139:205a-5: drag po rnams gang byed kyang /
T02D2139:205a-6: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi gsham du las bzhi'i sngags btags pas dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2139:205a-8: spyan ras gzigs kyi rgyud pa padma zab pa dang /
T02D2139:205a-9: padma rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur pa'i rab tu byed pa 'di //
T02D2139:205a-10: dpal dza' landha ra pas mdzad pa'o //
T02D2139:205a-11: mnga' bdag mee tri pa'i phyag dpe las /
T02D2139:205a-12: rgya gar phyag na'i zhal snga nas dang /
